job description
stores - roles and responsibilities:
in charge for receipts, documentation, warehousing, inventory and stocking. receive incoming goods and supervise unloading of material count. ensure that rules and regulations relating to customs and completed before receiving the goods.
check for hazardous / non-hazardous material, damage, discrepancy and arrange for inspection accordingly.
prepare goods receipt note (grn) and offer inspection to quality with proper tags and follow up for qc clearance.
qc accepted goods are moved to stores location with proper tags, in case of qc rejection prepare goods rejection memo (rtv).
send other documents to respective department (are1, boe, rgp) ensure all storage facilities are in proper working order e.g. check for loose racks, damaged pallets etc.
ensure all materials handling equipment are in good condition, eg using vacuum pen for msd components.
ensure the manufacturer recommended shelf life and storage condition for every components/material.
ensure correct accounting of stores and receipts and issues are correctly documented (ein/idn/mrin).
coordinate with purchasing section on materials relating to purchases, inventory, and non-inventory items according to specifications and standards.
based on production requirement, materials are issued with proper tags (kitting) in fifo basis to production on timely basis to avoid line stoppage.
proper validation are done while receiving the material from production, in specific the material loss ratio in production and reported circulated to related team.
safety stock are measured on weekly basis and report has been circulated to all divisions for proper measures.
